title: Ticket #5124: SSL private key being fetched for every connection in client tools
description:
Currently the client tools request a private key password for every connection when utilizing SSL: 

[moate@e095 openssl]$ condor_vacate -fast -const 'State == "Preempting" && remoteowner == "adluru@chtc.wisc.edu"'
Enter PEM pass phrase:
Sent "Vacate-Claim-Fast" command to startd slot1_1@c013.chtc.wisc.edu
Enter PEM pass phrase:
Sent "Vacate-Claim-Fast" command to startd slot1_1@e011.chtc.wisc.edu

It would be nice if they asked for the password once and used the unencrypted private key for every connection made.

Cheers,

-Moate
remarks:
2015-Jul-09 17:26:04 by moate:
This can also make it so that a password has to be entered at least twice for just about any condor tool - one time for each collector query to find the sinful string of the daemon, and one time to connect to the daemon itself.

-Moate
